claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: Forest plot titled “Relative Vaccine Effectiveness (95% CI)” showing point estimates and confidence intervals for multiple subgroups (cardiovascular disease, respiratory disease, cardiorespiratory disease, obesity, diabetes, any of the above) under outcomes: PCR-confirmed influenza, hospitalization for PCR-confirmed influenza, and hospitalization for community-acquired pneumonia. The x-axis is percentage effectiveness from –50 to 55. does not support the claim because the figure presents subgroup vaccine effectiveness data and contains no information on Flublok’s production method or use of recombinant HA expression in insect cells via BEVS.

The x-axis is percentage effectiveness from –50 to 55.
